title: Rural Hospital Financial Vulnerability Index
prompt: A worn ledger or financial document lying on a wooden desk in dim morning light, with a coffee cup and reading glasses nearby; a rural hospital administrator's office visible through a doorway in soft focus behind, showing institutional beige walls and the corner of a calendar; the photograph taken from above at an angle that emphasizes the weight and texture of the paperwork, with shadows from window blinds creating stark lines across the surface, conveying administrative burden and financial strain without dramatics.
